summary: A Norwegian web project with a music page (songs shown only there, not on front page), navigation menu, and Internet Identity 2.0 integration. Currently removing 'Tjenester' from nav menu and updating Internet Identity description for II 2.0.

existing_features.title: Remove the 'Tjenester' (Services) item from the navigation menu in Header.tsx so it no longer appears in either the desktop or mobile menu.

Update the Internet Identity description text (wherever it appears in the app, e.g. LandingPage.tsx, PublicSubmissionForm.tsx, ClientPortal.tsx) to reflect Internet Identity 2.0 capabilities: support for passkeys, Google, Apple, and Microsoft sign-in, replacing any outdated description.

new_feature_requests.summary: Oppdater beskrivelsen av Internet Identity til Ã¥ passe med II 2.0 (passkeys, Google, Apple, Microsoft)
